Comment: It is genuinely terrifying.  My husband and I are weighing if we leave, and it is a heart breaking decision.    My dad has Parkinson's and Diabetes (which for anyone who doesn't know the average life expectancy from diagnosis w/ Parkinson's if you also have Diabetes is 7 years).  He was diagnosed 2 years ago.    I know logically he would tell me to leave, even if he couldn't get out.  But I also know that realistically with the path America is on and how long it typically takes a country to get out from under an authoritarian regime I wouldn't see my Dad again.  I'm in my late 30's, I may not ever get to go back to America if I leave.
Author: L_obsoleta
